HediffDef.label: psychically-accelerated healing
HediffDef.description: This creature is healing at a much faster rate than is natural. This rapid regeneration will make them hungrier than usual.

HediffDef.label: psychically-enchanced mind
HediffDef.description: This mind can follow multiple lines of thought simultaneously, allowing research to conducted much more quickly. However, this extra cerebral activity is tiring.

HediffDef.label: psychically-amped body
HediffDef.description: This person is flush up with psychic energy. They will move faster and finish manual tasks more quickly. The extra calories they burn will also make them hungier than usual.

HediffDef.label: sensing others thoughts
HediffDef.description: This mind can perceive the surface level thoughts and emotions of others nearby. This low-level telepathy gives a decided edge in negotiations, finding common ground in conversation, and the crafting of perfectly tailored insults.

HediffDef.label: receiving premonitions
HediffDef.description: This mind is receiving flashes of the immediate future, warning of imminent danger as well as the intended movements of nearby foes.

HediffDef.label: in a psychically-induced coma
HediffDef.description: This creature is in stasis. Most biological functions have been substantially slowed, reducing the need for food and rest, as well as slowing any bleeding.

HediffDef.label: psychically-fortified
HediffDef.description: Psychic energy courses through this creatures body, hardening skin, bone and sinew. While this will substantially reduce incoming damage, it also hampers their movements a little.

HediffDef.label: mind link
HediffDef.description: A psychic link with another individual. Some of the skill experience gained by one linked member will be shared with the other, providing they have the capacity to learn the skill in question.
